metadata.title: CVE-2022-43248 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Libde265 v1.0.8 was discovered to contain a heap-buffer-overflowvulnerability via put_weighted_pred_avg_16_fallback in fallback-motion.cc.This vulnerability allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) viaa crafted video file.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
